verses.t: I will bless{H1288} Lordthe {H3068} at all times{H6256}: his praise{H8416} shall continually{H8548} be in my mouth{H6310}.Abimelech: or, Achish
My soul{H5315} shall make her boast{H1984} Lordin the {H3068}: the humble{H6035} shall hear{H8085} thereof, and be glad{H8055}.
O magnify{H1431} Lordthe {H3068} with me, and let us exalt{H7311} his name{H8034} together{H3162}.
I sought{H1875} Lordthe {H3068}, and he heard{H6030} me, and delivered{H5337} me from all my fears{H4035}.
They looked{H5027} unto him, and were lightened{H5102}: and their faces{H6440} were not ashamed{H2659}.were lightened: or, they flowed unto him
This poor man{H6041} cried{H7121}, Lordand the {H3068} heard{H8085} him, and saved{H3467} him out of all his troubles{H6869}.
The angel{H4397} Lordof the {H3068} encampeth{H2583} round about{H5439} them that fear{H3373} him, and delivereth{H2502} them.
O taste{H2938} and see{H7200} Lordthat the {H3068} is good{H2896}: blessed{H835} is the man{H1397} that trusteth{H2620} in him.
O fear{H3372} Lordthe {H3068}, ye his saints{H6918}: for there is no want{H4270} to them that fear{H3373} him.
The young lions{H3715} do lack{H7326}, and suffer hunger{H7456}: but they that seek{H1875} Lordthe {H3068} shall not want{H2637} any good{H2896} thing.
Come{H3212}, ye children{H1121}, hearken{H8085} unto me: I will teach{H3925} you the fear{H3374} Lordof the {H3068}.
What man{H376} is he that desireth{H2655} life{H2416}, and loveth{H157} many days{H3117}, that he may see{H7200} good{H2896}?
Keep{H5341} thy tongue{H3956} from evil{H7451}, and thy lips{H8193} from speaking{H1696} guile{H4820}.
Depart{H5493} from evil{H7451}, and do{H6213} good{H2896}; seek{H1245} peace{H7965}, and pursue{H7291} it.
The eyes{H5869} Lordof the {H3068} are upon the righteous{H6662}, and his ears{H241} are open unto their cry{H7775}.
The face{H6440} Lordof the {H3068} is against them that do{H6213} evil{H7451}, to cut off{H3772} the remembrance{H2143} of them from the earth{H776}.
The righteous cry{H6817}, Lordand the {H3068} heareth{H8085}, and delivereth{H5337} them out of all their troubles{H6869}.

LordThe {H3068} is nigh{H7138} unto them that are of a broken{H7665} heart{H3820}; and saveth{H3467} such as be of a contrite{H1793} spirit{H7307}.unto…: Heb. to the broken of heartof a contrite…: Heb. contrite of spirit
Many{H7227} are the afflictions{H7451} of the righteous{H6662}: Lordbut the {H3068} delivereth{H5337} him out of them all.
He keepeth{H8104} all his bones{H6106}: not one{H259} of them{H2007} is broken{H7665}.
Evil{H7451} shall slay{H4191} the wicked{H7563}: and they that hate{H8130} the righteous{H6662} shall be desolate{H816}.desolate: or, guilty
LordThe {H3068} redeemeth{H6299} the soul{H5315} of his servants{H5650}: and none of them that trust{H2620} in him shall be desolate{H816}.desolate: or, guilty
